cityToCity.title: City-to-city rides
cityToCity.desc: A stress-free solution for long-distance rides between cities with professional chauffeurs.

chauffeurHailing.title: Chauffeur hailing
chauffeurHailing.desc: Experience the quality of a traditional chauffeur service with the convenience of riding within minutes of booking.

airportTransfers.title: Airport transfers
airportTransfers.desc: Reliable airport transfers with additional wait time and flight tracking for a seamless travel experience.

hourlyHire.title: Hourly and full day hire
hourlyHire.desc: Total flexibility, reliability and comfort for your hourly or full-day transportation needs.

safetyFirst.title: Safety first
safetyFirst.desc: Your safety is our top priority. All chauffeurs are verified, licensed, and undergo thorough background checks.

privateTravel.title: Private travel solutions
privateTravel.desc: Your one-stop travel shop for city-to-city rides, airport transfers, hourly hire, and chauffeur hailing.

sustainableTravel.title: Sustainable travel
sustainableTravel.desc: All ride emissions are offset as part of our commitment to sustainable and responsible transportation.

airportTransfer.businessVanDesc: Mercedes V-Class, Volkswagen Caravelle Executive, Toyota Alphard, or similar
airportTransfer.electricClassDesc: Audi e-tron, Tesla Model X, Tesla Model S, or similar
airportTransfer.competitiveRatesDesc: Access premium service at distance-based prices that are fair to you and our chauffeurs.
airportTransfer.seamlessAirportTravelDesc: Relax with 1 hour of complimentary wait time and flight tracking.
airportTransfer.travelOnYourTermsDesc: Stay flexible and in charge of your travel schedule. It's quick and easy for you to cancel our service changes to stay vital.
airportTransfer.whatDoesAirportTransferDo: What does an airport transfer do?
airportTransfer.whatDoesAirportTransferDoAnswer: An airport transfer provides door-to-door transportation between the airport and your destination. Our professional chauffeurs track your flight and adjust pickup times accordingly.

cityToCity.howDoIGetQuote: How do I get a quote?
cityToCity.howDoIGetQuoteAnswer: You can get an instant quote by entering your trip details in the booking form above.
cityToCity.whatVehiclesAnswer: We offer Business Class sedans, Business Van/SUVs, and First Class luxury vehicles.

chauffeurHailing.downloadAppDesc: Download the Blacklane® Chauffeur Hailing™ app to hail chauffeurs on demand across Dubai.
chauffeurHailing.convenienceDesc: Get a door-to-door chauffeured ride, right when you need with just a few taps in the Blacklane app.
chauffeurHailing.comfortDesc: A private ride in a top-of-the-line vehicle makes every journey a pleasure, not just a means to an end.
chauffeurHailing.qualityDesc: Making your experience excellent is our top priority. Enjoy the matchless service you deserve for all your travels.
chauffeurHailing.yourScheduleDesc: Depart when it suits you: no need to work around flight, flight, or rental car times. Plus, free cancellation up until 1 hour before your ride.
chauffeurHailing.reliabilityDesc: Book with certainty, then stay in the know with real-time ride status updates and chauffeur location tracking.

hourlyHire.getLuxuryDesc: You decide where and when to go, knowing that your chauffeur is waiting patiently; you need to make unmentioned during your journey, or to have time relaxing. You can rent for 2 hours and all the way up to 3 hours.
hourlyHire.enjoyPeaceDesc: Travel with one of our premium vehicles, where you can have premium hours during your ride. Everything is inclusive—fuel, cleaning, insurance, tolls, and local taxes—so there are no surprise charges at the end of the day.
hourlyHire.versatilityDesc: Your chauffeurs are trained to the highest quality and privacy standards.
hourlyHire.rideWithConfidenceDesc: With Blacklane's high standards, no matter what happens, you'll feel confident that you can count on us to be here with more: you to reach your destination on time and relax while you enjoy the ride.

corporateTravel.businessTripsDesc: Provide your employees with the most comfortable transport for their business trips. Add an extra revenue source to your companies, whether domestic or international.
corporateTravel.corporateEventsDesc: To the board meeting, taking a business trip or going to a conference, make sure your executives and visitors arrive on time and in style.
corporateTravel.roadshowsDesc: Get a vehicle for your entire roadshow trip. Our chauffeurs can wait at each location and are ready when you are for the next destination.
corporateTravel.competitivePricingDesc: Access premium service at fixed, distance-based prices that are fair to you and our chauffeurs.
corporateTravel.globalAvailabilityDesc: Book in over 50 countries and 300+ cities worldwide with consistent quality and service.
corporateTravel.priorityDispatchingDesc: Get priority booking and dispatching for your corporate account with dedicated support.
corporateTravel.easyBookingDesc: Book through our portal, API, app or phone. Set profiles and payment methods for team members.
corporateTravel.corporateReportsDesc: Get detailed cost reports and usage statistics to help you manage travel budgets efficiently.
corporateTravel.businessTailoredOptionsDesc: We provide the right ride for every occasion, from sedans to SUVs and vans.

events.yourChauffeurDesc: Flexible service to go and when. Work on the move with your chauffeur waiting to your timescale, wherever it feels right for you.
events.effortlessCityTravelDesc: Navigating a new city? Skip the chaos, confusion and finding parking. Your chauffeur manages all logistics, so you can travel efficiently without the stress.
